Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • Book
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Book>

    public class Book
extends Object
implements Comparable<Book>
    A custom class for storing basic book information. This class is not suitable for use in a set or to use a Book object as a key in a map, since it is a mutable class.
    See Also:
    Comparable

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Book.Author
      Inner class for storing comparable authors.

      Fields

      Authors of the book.

      ISBN number of the book.
      private int pages
      Number of pages in the book.
      private String title
      Title of the book, without quotation marks.
      private int year
      Year book was published.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Book()
      Initializes an empty book object with no authors.

      Initializes a book object with multiple authors.
      Book(String title, String isbn, Book.Author onlyAuthor, int year, int pages)
      Initializes a book object with a single author.

      • addAuthor

        public boolean addAuthor(Book.Author author)
        Adds an author to the end of the author list if it non-null and non-empty. Does not make sure it is a non-duplicate name!
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the author was added

        public Book.Author getFirstAuthor()
